content: the red version was knit using frog tree merino worsted and the green version was knit using lamb s pride worsted it s important to choose a yarn that you can block--100% wool works best but other animal fibers/blends will also work 100% acrylic is not recommended edit if you don t like the flair that happens on the button band end you could try going down a needle size or two for that section this might require slightly smaller buttons though just a thought
